request.description: Get Business User Profile by ID

item.name: assign channel profile(which is not allowed)

script.exec:
tests["status code is 400 : Bad Request"] = responseCode.code === 400;
postman.clearEnvironmentVariable('ChannelId');

body.raw:
{
    "FirstName": "richard",
    "LastName": "stallman",
    "MiddleName": "",
    "AffiliateBankID": 4,
    "BankId": "1000",

script.exec: tests["Cannot Delete profile which is associated with user"] = responseBody.has("The entitlement profile cannot be deleted.");

var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody);
tests["User created"] = jsonData.d.UserName === environment["UserName"];

item.name: Add RetailUser Profile(MA Platinum) to assign in PUT

script.exec: tests["status code is 204 : No Content"] = responseCode.code === 204;

body.raw:
{
    "Id": "{{UserId}}",
    "FirstName": "richardModified",
    "LastName": "stallman",
    "MiddleName": "",
    "AffiliateBankID": 4,
    "BankId": "1000",
    "ConfirmPassword": null,
    "ConfirmPasswordReminder": null,
    "ConfirmPasswordReminder2": null,
    "CustId": "manoj",
    "Greeting": null,
    "GreetingType": "2",
    "Password": null,
    "PasswordClue": null,
    "PasswordClue2": null,
    "MemberId": null,
    "GroupId": "2080",
    "GroupName": null,
    "PasswordReminder": null,
    "PasswordReminder2": null,
    "PersonalBanker": "0",
    "Ssn": "133-12-1234",
    "MaskSSN": null,
    "UserName": "{{UserName}}",
    "AccountStatus": "1",
    "Timeout": "1500",
    "CustomerType": "2",
    "RequestedCarrierTCId": null,
    "Address": {
      "__metadata": {
        "type": "com.sap.banking.common.endpoint.v1_0.beans.Address"
      },
      "Street": "1119 Overlake Drive",
      "Street2": "",
      "Street3": null,
      "City": "Tulsa",
      "State": "OK",
      "StreetCode": null,
      "Country": "USA",
      "Email": "manoj@anymail.com",
      "Phone": "(206) 555-1423",
      "Phone2": null,
      "ZipCode": "98007",
      "DataPhone": null,
      "FaxPhone": null,
      "PreferredContactMethod": null,
      "PreferredLanguage": "en_US"
    },
    "OldPassword": null,
    "NewPassword": null,
    "PasswordStatus": "Valid",
    "RetailUserProfiles": [{
                                                "Id" : "{{NewId}}"
       }]
}
